description: Security pack: detect usage of weak cryptographic algorithm (MD5) in config

explanation_trace.why_triggered: Config file contains 'md5' which matches the weak crypto regex: (?i)(md5|sha1|des|rc4)\b
explanation_trace.edge_case_notes: ConfigScanner only processes files with config extensions (.conf, .yaml, .json, etc.). The regex is case-insensitive with word boundary.
